activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.filemanager.pro.activities.MainActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: acts as the root layout containing other major UI components like the search menu, view pager, and tab layout.
holds the ViewPager which displays different fragments (ItemsFragment, RecentsFragment, StorageFragment).
switches between different file management views (files, recents, storage) based on user tab selection.
provides bottom navigation tabs for switching between files, recent files, and storage analysis views.
shows a message when no recent files are found, indicating empty state in the RecentsFragment.
allows users to refresh the list of recent files by swiping down.
shows a list or grid of recently accessed files and allows user interaction with them.

activities.summary: MainActivity serves as the main interface for a file manager application, providing navigation between different file-related fragments (e.g., files, recents, storage), managing UI settings (view type, column count, sorting), handling file operations, and supporting favorites, password protection, and permissions. It also handles interactions like picking files, creating documents, and navigating home directories.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.filemanager.pro.activities.SplashActivity
activities.summary: The SplashActivity is typically used as a starting screen for the app, which might perform initialization tasks and navigate to the main part of the application after a delay or based on certain conditions.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.filemanager.pro.activities.FavoritesActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Hosts top-level views including toolbar and content holder with scrolling behavior.
Allows user interaction via menu items like adding a new favorite.
Holds RecyclerView and placeholder text views for managing favorites.
Shows the list of added favorite directories using a custom adapter.

static_properties.text: You can add frequently used folders to favorites for easy access from anywhere.

dynamic_properties.effect: Displayed when there are no favorites; provides guidance on usage.
Triggers the addition of a new favorite by invoking 'addFavorite()' when clicked.

static_properties.text: You can add frequently used folders to favorites for easy access from anywhere.

activities.summary: FavoritesActivity is used to manage favorite directories in the File Manager app. It allows users to add, view, and manage their favorite folders using a RecyclerView for display. UI placeholders are shown when no favorites exist, guiding the user to add one.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.filemanager.pro.activities.MimeTypesActivity

layouts.name: R.menu.* (implicit reference to menu containing R.id.search)

activities.summary: The MimeTypesActivity is responsible for displaying and managing files grouped by MIME type. It supports various view types (grid/list), sorting, searching, zooming via column count adjustments, toggling hidden files, and other UI customization options. The activity dynamically fetches and filters file data based on the provided MIME type and allows users to interact with the files through contextual actions.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.filemanager.pro.activities.SimpleActivity
activities.summary: This activity serves as a base or common activity for handling general functionalities in the file manager application, potentially including configuration settings, theme management, and navigation.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.filemanager.pro.activities.SettingsActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: navigates to color customization settings.
switches the app's language between the device default and English.
opens a dialog or intent to change the app's language.
navigates to FavoritesActivity for managing favorite files or folders.
displays a dialog to manage which tabs are visible in the app.
shows a dialog to change the date and time format used in the app.
presents a dialog to select and update the app's font size.

static_properties.text: Require pressing Back twice to leave the app

dynamic_properties.effect: enables/disables the requirement of pressing the back button twice to exit the app.
toggles visibility of hidden items in the file manager UI.
enables/disables pull-to-refresh functionality in the app.
controls whether the last modified timestamp of files is preserved.
skips or requires confirmation before deleting files.
protects hidden items with password authentication.
password protects the entire app using PIN, pattern, or fingerprint.
requires password authentication before allowing file deletion.
enables/disables root access for advanced file operations.

static_properties.text: Require pressing Back twice to leave the app

activities.summary: This activity is used for managing application settings, including color customization, language options, file operations, visibility settings, password protections, and other general configurations.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.filemanager.pro.activities.SaveAsActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Provides coordination between child views for animations and behaviors such as app bars and floating action buttons.
Shows the toolbar with title 'Save As' and styled according to AppTheme.ActionBar.TitleTextStyle.
Holds UI components related to file saving operations.

activities.summary: This activity is used to save a shared file to a user-selected destination. It validates the incoming intent, opens a file picker dialog to choose a directory, and handles copying the file using SAF, showing appropriate feedback messages.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.filemanager.pro.activities.DecompressActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Hosts UI components including the toolbar and RecyclerView for displaying ZIP contents.
Shows the title 'Decompress' and provides options menu access for initiating decompression.
Wraps and manages layout behavior for scrollable content containing the file list.
Lists the files and folders contained in the current path within the ZIP archive, allowing navigation into subdirectories by click.

activities.summary: This activity is used for decompressing ZIP files. It allows users to navigate through the contents of a ZIP file, enter passwords for encrypted archives, and select a destination folder to extract files to. The extraction process runs in the background and ensures safe handling of paths to avoid security issues.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.filemanager.pro.activities.PDFViewerActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: wraps the PDF viewer and appbar to manage scrolling behavior with AppBarLayout.
displays the PDF document from the provided URI and supports interactions like tap to toggle full-screen.
provides a shadow effect at the top of the screen to visually separate the PDF content from the status bar or appbar.
holds the toolbar and manages its elevation and alignment at the top of the activity.
displays the filename, navigation icon to close the activity, and menu items including print option.

activities.summary: The PDFViewerActivity is responsible for displaying PDF files in a viewer component. It handles incoming intents with PDF URIs, supports full-screen mode, manages display cutouts (notch), and provides functionalities such as printing and password-protected PDF access.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.filemanager.pro.activities.ReadTextActivity
activities.summary: The ReadTextActivity is used to display and edit text content from a file or URI. It supports functionalities like searching within the text, saving changes to a file, printing the content, and handling back press behavior with unsaved changes confirmation.
